description: The artist likely suffered with delirium as a result of alcohol withdrawal, Dutch researchers say.
title: Van Gogh: Artist experienced 'delirium from alcohol withdrawal'
title_page: Van Gogh: Artist experienced 'delirium from alcohol withdrawal' - BBC News
maintext: "Although [they] contain a lot of information, we must remember that he didn't write them to his doctors, but to... family members and other relatives in order to inform them, to reassure them or to get something done," he said.
